name: Crystann: Le Donjon De Diamant
overview:
Get ready for the worst, Crystann, because you decided to bring back the precious jade statuette hidden deep in the Diamond Dungeon.
Your crazy adventure will lead you through sixty rooms, on countless ladders, swing ropes,
endless falls that may be end up on one of the many bloody peaks scattered throughout the dungeon.
You'll even have to dive into the boiling waters of the underground river that runs through the caves!
You'll have to fight against the filthy medusoids, dig stone blocks, but will you be able to avoid the hidden traps?
Courage! Victory awaits you ...
